articles.author: Greg Myre
articles.title: How Bitcoin Has Fueled Ransomware Attacks
articles.description: If you're planning a multi-million dollar ransomware attack, there's really only one way to collect - with cryptocurrency. It's fast. It's easy. Best of all, it's largely anonymous and hard to trace.
articles.content: As ransomware cases surge, the cyber criminals almost almost always demand, and receive, payment in cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin. The world's largest meat supplier, JBS, announced Wednesday that it … [+5393 chars]
